Your most welcome, Karen. Hope to meet you one of these days :) I
understand you all have a neat crystal mine to dig in. I'm thinking
about travelling down there and doing some exploring for a nice
Spring trip.

Pamela
Spc in Mo

messages.subject: Re: I'm Bursting with Joy! :)
messages.msgSnippet: Today, our daily newspaper ran an article on my nonprofit corporation,  FIELD TRIPS!!!  Here it is............... Maybe one day, reporters will  gain the
messages.messageBody:
Today, our daily newspaper ran an article on my nonprofit corporation, FIELD
TRIPS!!! Here it is............... Maybe one day, reporters will gain the
understanding that unschoolers don't "plan lessons". On the upside, it was a
fair article :)

_http://www.news-leader.com/today/20050207-FieldTrips!gets.html_
(http://www.news-leader.com/today/20050207-FieldTrips!gets.html)

Spc in MO
